channel.title: jimgrisham tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from jimgrisham.

item.description: @deepa_gk @antonioguterres @UN A permanent member of the #SecurityCouncil has veto power over limited votes regarding disputes to which they are a party … … only as long as no other member makes a formal challenge. Sadly, that _almost never_ has happened: https://t.co/3IwKVHU6Tv https://t.co/IFM0bWFyqg

@ftp_alun @concreted0g @Hogan698 @bookwormwmb @TheRealHoarse @shaunwalker7 You could reload paintballs with actual paint (or other substances), right? A syringe with an ISO 18 G (or larger) needle should probably work, available from any pharmacy. Farm and veterinary suppliers also have them.

@SherineT … and still, no member formally requests that another member honors their obligation under the UN Charter to recuse themselves from disputes to which they are a party. https://t.co/3IwKVHU6Tv
@SCRtweets https://t.co/3IwKVHU6Tv
@robertcraigiii @quinnnorton @mmasnick … and @courtlistener, which has both a website and an API.
@kreme_puff @mmasnick Often times articles and press releases don’t even include case numbers.

@markproxy @AmtrakAlerts Just be glad you weren’t trying to take the train from Miama to New Orleans… the last one departed in what, 2005? The next train won’t arrive until at least 2024, depending on the results from next month’s Surface Transportation Board hearing.

@AmtrakAlerts https://t.co/B72U0Lw3oE
@AmtrakAlerts https://t.co/JO5pBMlul6

@AmtrakAlerts https://t.co/B72U0Lw3oE
@AmtrakAlerts https://t.co/JO5pBMlul6
@opiejeanne @davidmoffitt @j_quadrifrons @KCMOPro @dcmichaelrose It follows US Highway 2 for most of that time, so there’s more signal than one might expect.
@ternoveau @436bGliese @wideofthepost @haymarketbooks Exactly. Javert was indeed a tragic hero. The system failed _everyone_. Miserably. (At least we have space weapons and Netflix now, so progress?)
@BMunise @offlineleft That makes us look even worse!
@SherlockHemloc2 @wideofthepost Drug crimes are signs of systemic societal dysfunction. Until we confront that, any ‘war on drugs’ has less chance of sustained success than a land war in Asia.
@propcharles @jcschmieder @wideofthepost Or leave your doors unlocked with a $20 on the seat.

@jcschmieder @wideofthepost The same ‘innocent’ residents that routinely drive by their unhoused cousins and do little or nothing to help? (help can be provided in many non-financial ways - being active in local politics, befriending folks on the street, etc…)
@436bGliese @wideofthepost @haymarketbooks It’s a terrible tragic tale. Javert worked so hard, from nothing, and all he ever wanted was respect for doing the right thing.
@daniellamyoung [link]
